headline.main: MUSSOLINI URGED BY EDEN TO YIELD; Britain Will Not Approach Italy on Bombing Rome, He Says

lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 30 (AP) -- Foreign Secretary Anthony Eden called upon Premier Mussolini today "to accept the unconditional surrender offered to him" and said that Britain had not approached and did not intend to approach Italy regarding the question of bombing Rome.
abstract: Urges Mussolini surrender; says Allies will bomb Rome if necessary, Commons
